doc:
Mary Beth Evans https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Beth_Evans 0 Mary Beth Evans (born March 7, 1961) is an American television actress, known for her role as Kayla Brady on the NBC daytime soap Days of Our Lives, and her role as Sierra Estaban on the CBS daytime soap As the World Turns. Mary_Beth Evans ( born March_7_,_1961 ) is an_American_television_actress , known for her_role as Kayla_Brady on the_NBC_daytime_soap_Days of Our_Lives , and her_role as Sierra_Estaban on the_CBS_daytime_soap As the_World Turns .
